summary: Frontend testing of filters and field configuration features in Parcelas, Visitas, and Tratamientos pages completed successfully. All features working as expected - filters properly filter data, field config panels work with checkboxes, and localStorage persistence is functioning correctly.

issues: Console hydration warnings for span elements in table/select structures - caused by visual editor metadata injection, cosmetic only

passed_tests: Parcelas: Filters panel visible with data-testid='filters-panel'
Parcelas: Proveedor filter dropdown works (found 4 options: Todos, Test Proveedor, EDITED: Updated Proveedor, AgroTest)
Parcelas: Cultivo filter dropdown works (found 4 options)
Parcelas: Campaña filter dropdown works (found 2 options)
Parcelas: Parcela filter dropdown works (found 4 options)
Parcelas: Filter results display 'Mostrando X de Y parcelas' message correctly
Parcelas: 'Limpiar filtros' button clears all filters
Parcelas: Settings button (data-testid='btn-config-fields') opens config panel
Parcelas: Config panel (data-testid='fields-config-panel') displays 9 field checkboxes
Parcelas: Unchecking 'Variedad' hides the column from table
Parcelas: localStorage 'parcelas_fields_config' persists configuration
Visitas: Filters panel visible with 4 filters (Proveedor, Cultivo, Campaña, Parcela)
Visitas: Filtering by Proveedor shows 'Mostrando 2 de 7 visitas'
Visitas: Settings button opens config panel with two sections
Visitas: 'Campos del Formulario' section with 4 checkboxes (Parcela marked obligatorio)
Visitas: 'Columnas de la Tabla' section with 7 checkboxes
Visitas: Total 11 checkboxes in config panel
Visitas: localStorage 'visitas_fields_config' and 'visitas_table_config' persist
Tratamientos: Filters panel with 4 filters (Proveedor, Cultivo, Campaña, Tipo Tratamiento)
Tratamientos: Tipo Tratamiento filter shows 'Herbicida' and 'FITOSANITARIOS' options
Tratamientos: Filtering by tipo shows 'Mostrando 2 de 9 tratamientos'
Tratamientos: Config panel with 'Campos del Formulario' (7 checkboxes) and 'Columnas de la Tabla' (7 checkboxes)
Tratamientos: Total 14 checkboxes in config panel
Tratamientos: Parcelas marked as (obligatorio) in form fields
Tratamientos: localStorage 'tratamientos_fields_config' and 'tratamientos_table_config' persist
localStorage persistence: Config survives page reload (verified Plantas column stays hidden)
critical_code_review_comments: Console hydration warnings in tables are caused by visual editor metadata injection (span inside tr/th/td) - not a code issue, purely cosmetic
context_for_next_testing_agent: Filters and field configuration features fully tested and working in Parcelas, Visitas, and Tratamientos. localStorage keys used: parcelas_fields_config, visitas_fields_config, visitas_table_config, tratamientos_fields_config, tratamientos_table_config. All filters are dynamic dropdowns populated from existing data.
